text: Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia kamaghɨn oraki, me fomɨra kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Ia uan namakabagh ifongegh, egh pazɨ uan apanibar amu.’5:43 Mɨgɨrɨgɨar uan namakabara ifongeghamim, a Ofa Gami 19:18ɨn iti. Ezɨ akar uan apanibagh ifongeghan koghamim itir danganim e a gɨfozir puvatɨ. Nɨ Godɨn Araziba 7:2, ko 20:16, ko Onger Akaba 139:21-22ɨn gan.
